mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rec_avg_min_factor (rec_id, factor_id, d_time, d_value, d_flag, is_alarm, alarm_value, alarm_type, d_min, d_max, d_cou) VALUES (#{recID}, #{factorID}, #{dataTime}, #{dataValue}, #{dataFlag}, #{isAlarm}, #{alarmValue}, #{alarmType}, #{dataMin}, #{dataMax}, #{dataCou});

mapper.select: select * from rec_sample;
mapper.update: UPDATE rec_sample SET rec_time = #{rec_time}, volume = #{volume}, unit = #{unit} where id = #{id};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ${tableName} WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT t.id FROM (SELECT * FROM ${tableName} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT ${recSize}) as t);
